name: LC Landed Cost Details
query:
select lct.creation as 'التاريخ::100', lct.description as 'المصروف::300', lct.amount as 'المبلغ:Currency:120', 
lci.receipt_document_type as 'نوع المستند::120', lci.receipt_document as 'المستند:Link/Purchase Receipt:120', 
lcpr.supplier as 'المورد:Link/Supplier:200', lci.item_code as 'الصنف:Link/Item:150', 
lci.qty as 'الكمية::100', lci.amount as 'القيمة:Currency:100',
lc.name as 'مستند المصروف:Link/Landed Cost Voucher:120', lc.company as 'الشركة::150', lc.business_unit as 'القطاع::150'
from `tabLanded Cost Voucher` lc 
left join `tabLanded Cost Item` lci on lc.name=lci.parent
left join `tabLanded Cost Purchase Receipt` lcpr on lc.name=lcpr.parent
left join `tabLanded Cost Taxes and Charges` lct on lc.name=lct.parent
where lc.lc_no=%(lc_no)s and lc.company=%(company)s
